plot: A woman searches for her children, who have been abducted by her ex-husband, a member of the German 'Red Liberation Front'.
plot_en: A woman searches for her children, who have been abducted by her ex-husband, a member of the German 'Red Liberation Front'.
plot_es: A woman searches for her children, who have been abducted by her ex-husband, a member of the German 'Red Liberation Front'.
title: Die Kinder
